issue.title: [CF 30] Button Facade Integration
issue.body:
Is it possible to get Button Facade Integration to let your really great addon to graphically merge in a customized UI?

Ty a lot


> Posted by CurseForge user Adam77 | Imported from CurseForge issue #30 | Raw

comments.body:
This would require a huge overhaul of the addon. Possibly something to include if I ever do a core rewrite.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
